home.welcomeDescription: Your gateway to the XRP Ledger. Connect your wallet to get started.
home.trustSetDescription: Set up trust lines for tokens

wallet.connectDescription: Select a wallet to connect to Ripplet
wallet.connectDescriptionPrompt: Connect your wallet to start signing XRPL transactions
wallet.notInstalledDescription: Please install the wallet extension to continue.
wallet.noAddressReceivedDescription: Please make sure you have created or imported a wallet account in {{wallet}} before connecting.
wallet.installPrompt: Please install the wallet extension and refresh the page.
wallet.connectionRejectedDescription: You rejected the connection request. Please try again and approve the connection.
wallet.comingSoonDescription: Support for this wallet is coming soon. Stay tuned!

transaction.pendingDescription: Please wait while your transaction is being processed.
transaction.successDescription: Your transaction has been confirmed on the ledger.
transaction.failedDescription: Your transaction could not be completed.

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: Send XRP to another account
payment.connectWalletDescription: Please connect your wallet to send payments
payment.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the reason for the payment
payment.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295

ioudPayment.title: IOU Payment
ioudPayment.subtitle: Send IOU tokens to another account
ioudPayment.issuerHint: The account that issues this token
ioudPayment.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the recipient
ioudPayment.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295

ioudEscrowCreate.title: Create IOU Escrow
ioudEscrowCreate.subtitle: Lock IOU tokens in an escrow
ioudEscrowCreate.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the recipient
ioudEscrowCreate.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
ioudEscrowCreate.issuerHint: The account that issues this token
ioudEscrowCreate.finishAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be finished
ioudEscrowCreate.finishAfterInvalid: FinishAfter must be less than CancelAfter
ioudEscrowCreate.cancelAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be cancelled
ioudEscrowCreate.conditionHint: Optional: A hex-encoded crypto-condition that must be met to finish
ioudEscrowCreate.ledgerIndexInvalid: Ledger index must be a valid positive integer

ioudEscrowFinish.title: Finish IOU Escrow
ioudEscrowFinish.subtitle: Release IOU tokens from escrow
ioudEscrowFinish.ownerHint: The account that created the escrow
ioudEscrowFinish.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer
ioudEscrowFinish.offerSequenceHint: The sequence number of the escrow creation transaction
ioudEscrowFinish.conditionHint: The condition from the original escrow (if applicable)
ioudEscrowFinish.fulfillmentHint: The hex-encoded fulfillment that satisfies the condition

mptTransfer.title: MPT Transfer
mptTransfer.subtitle: Send MPT tokens to another account
mptTransfer.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
mptTransfer.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295

mptLock.title: MPT Lock/Freeze
mptLock.subtitle: Lock or unlock MPT tokens for a holder
mptLock.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string

mptClawback.title: MPT Clawback
mptClawback.subtitle: Clawback MPT tokens from a holder
mptClawback.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string

offerCreate.title: Create Offer
offerCreate.subtitle: Create a new offer on the XRPL DEX

offerCancel.title: Cancel Offer
offerCancel.subtitle: Cancel an existing offer on the XRPL DEX

credentialCreate.title: Create Credential
credentialCreate.subtitle: Issue a credential for an account

credentialAccept.title: Accept Credential
credentialAccept.subtitle: Accept a credential issued to you

credentialDelete.title: Delete Credential
credentialDelete.subtitle: Remove a credential from the ledger

trustset.title: Trust Set
trustset.subtitle: Create or modify trust lines for issued currencies
trustset.currencyInvalid: Must be a 3-letter ISO code or 40-character hex string
trustset.issuerHint: The account that issues this currency
trustset.limitInvalid: Limit must be a valid number >= 0
trustset.limitZeroInfo: Setting limit to 0 will delete the trust line (if balance is also 0)

accountset.title: Account Settings
accountset.subtitle: Configure your XRPL account settings and flags
accountset.domainHint: Optional domain name for your account (will be hex encoded)

flags.defaultRippleTooltip: Enable rippling on trust lines by default. This allows your issued currencies to be automatically rippled through connected trust lines.
flags.requireAuthTooltip: Require authorization for others to hold your issued currencies (IOUs). Other accounts must be pre-approved to hold your tokens.
flags.disallowXRPTooltip: Disallow incoming XRP payments from strangers. Only accounts you've authorized can send you XRP.
flags.requireDestTagTooltip: Require a destination tag on all incoming payments. Useful for exchanges and hosted wallets to identify recipients.

accountdelete.title: Delete Account
accountdelete.warning1: Your account will be permanently deleted
accountdelete.warning2: All remaining XRP will be transferred to the destination
accountdelete.warning3: Account must have no trust lines or objects
accountdelete.destinationHint: Account to receive your remaining XRP balance
accountdelete.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the reason for the transfer
accountdelete.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
accountdelete.confirmLabel: I understand this will permanently delete my account
accountdelete.confirmHint: Please confirm you understand the risks

escrow.title: Escrow
escrow.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the reason for the escrow
escrow.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
escrow.finishAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be finished
escrow.finishAfterInvalid: FinishAfter must be less than CancelAfter
escrow.cancelAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be cancelled
escrow.conditionHint: Optional: A hex-encoded crypto-condition that must be met to finish
escrow.conditionFinishHint: The condition from the original escrow (if applicable)
escrow.fulfillmentHint: The hex-encoded fulfillment that satisfies the condition
escrow.ownerHint: The account that created the escrow
escrow.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer
escrow.offerSequenceHint: The sequence number of the escrow creation transaction

authorize.title: Authorize MPT
authorize.subtitle: Authorize holders or opt-in to hold an MPT

escrowCreate.title: MPT Escrow Create
escrowCreate.subtitle: Lock MPT tokens in an escrow
escrowCreate.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the recipient
escrowCreate.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
escrowCreate.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
escrowCreate.finishAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be finished
escrowCreate.finishAfterInvalid: FinishAfter must be less than CancelAfter
escrowCreate.cancelAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be cancelled
escrowCreate.conditionHint: Optional: A hex-encoded crypto-condition that must be met to finish
escrowCreate.ledgerIndexInvalid: Ledger index must be a valid positive integer

nftCancelOffer.title: Cancel NFT Offer
nftCancelOffer.subtitle: Cancel an NFT offer you created
nftCancelOffer.nftOffersRequired: At least one NFT offer ID is required

iouEscrowCancel.title: Cancel Escrow
iouEscrowCancel.subtitle: Cancel an IOU escrow and return funds
iouEscrowCancel.ownerHint: The account that created the escrow
iouEscrowCancel.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer
iouEscrowCancel.offerSequenceHint: The sequence number of the escrow creation transaction
